bibl.title: Letter from J.E.S. Thorpe to Henry Rose Carter, May 11, 1921

div1.p: Thorpe believes that Wolcott is currently in England.

div1.head: Letter from J.E.S. Thorpe to Henry Rose Carter, May 11, 1921
div1.opener:
J. E. S. THORPE
GENERAL SUPERINTENDENT
Tallassee Power Company
Badin, N.C. May 11th 1921
Dr. H. R. Carter, Asst. Surgeon General,
2121 California Street, N.W.,
Washington, D.C.
Dear Dr. Carter:
div1.p:
Replying to your letter of the 6th inst., inquiring as to
the whereabouts of Dr. Wolcott, would advise that Dr. Woalcott
left British Guiana early in April to spend a few months abroad.
However, a letter addressed to him in care of the Demerara Bauxite
Company, Ltd., P. O. Box 214, Georgetown, Demerara, British Guiana,
South America, will be forwarded to the doctor, as that office is
in touch with him. I understand that he is in England at the
present time but as to the exact location cannot say. The
Georgetown office however will gladly forward any communication
you may send the doctor.
div1.closer:
Yours very truly, J E S Thorpe HJS
Northern Aluminium Co Lt'd
31 Budge Row"
London, E.C. England
England.
